title: About a dollar's worth
creator_credit: Vincent Donovan and Department of Defence, Defence Public Relations
brief_description: Employs constructive montage and synthetic music to illustrate the benefits of the Royal Australian Air Force to Australians. Looks at training of personnel, rescue work, training of overseas personnel, and social activities.
